remarks: Closure of the function ` F ` which defines the Legendre symbol at the primes.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lgsval4.1 $e |- F = ( n e. NN |-> if ( n e. Prime , ( ( A /L n ) ^ ( n pCnt N ) ) , 1 ) ) $.
lgsfcl3 $p |- ( ( A e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ /\ N =/= 0 ) -> F : NN --> ZZ ) $.
$d A n $.
$d N n $.
